You can send messages to your friends by selecting them from the sidebar and typing in the message box.
To add a friend, enter their username in the 'Add friend by username' field in the sidebar.

You can log in with your username/email and password on the login page.
To register, go to the registration page and fill in your details.
If you forgot your password, you can use the 'Forgot password?' link on the login page or email your issue to help@chatzero.com using your registered email.
